title: [Dancer in the dark review : The Movie Show]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film criticism
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture journalism - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Appreciation
abstract: Margaret and David get fired up reviewing Lars von Trier's 'Dancer in the Dark' for 'The Movie Show'.
description: This review by ‘The Movie Show’ hosts Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton is one of the more fiery exchanges between the two reviewers. Lars von Trier's "grim musical" 'Dancer in the Dark' is the film under the microscope, inspiring wildly different perspectives from Margaret and David.
